function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate number of AIIRs (Airborne Infection Isolation Rooms) for severely affected COVID-19 patients","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and overwhelmed healthcare system","Mitigation":"Increase the number of AIIRs to meet the demand for isolation of severely affected COVID-19 patients","Technologies":"HVAC systems with HEPA filters, negative pressure rooms, and UV-C light disinfection systems","People":"Severely affected COVID-19 patients, healthcare workers, and other patients","Owner":"Hospital management and government health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate room size and equipment for critical COVID-19 patients requiring extracorporeal membrane oxygenation, mechanical ventilation, or continuous renal replacement therapy","Impact":"Inability to provide necessary medical care and increased risk of complications for critical patients","Mitigation":"Select and equip large rooms with necessary medical devices and supplies for critical patient care","Technologies":"Extracorporeal membrane oxygenation machines, mechanical ventilators, continuous renal replacement therapy machines, suctioning devices, medical air and oxygen supplies","People":"Critical COVID-19 patients, medical personnel","Owner":"Hospital management and medical department"},{"Description":"Lack of anterooms for partitioning to create additional AIIRs","Impact":"Inability to create necessary isolated spaces for contagious disease patients, leading to increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Create anterooms through partitioning of existing spaces to expand the number of AIIRs","Technologies":"Partition walls, negative pressure systems, UV-C light disinfection, air exchange systems","People":"Contagious disease patients, healthcare workers","Owner":"Hospital management and facility maintenance team"}]}
